the costumes of men and women who today are displayed at parties sampedrinas, were inspired by the dresses of our ancestors, but improved substantially at the suggestion of the same hand in hand to facilitate the movements of baile.El traditional dress of women has now passed , borders homelands that have won awards and citations internacionales.La white blouse and cut tray, surrounded by rings, developed in lace and lace, adorned with sequins, adjusted atrás.La waisted skirt and zipper Satin is made with bright colors, floral decorations has painted in oil or die cut and silk flowers flights rounds that harmonizes with the blouse, her long legs and is half its width is below the ring and medio.Por the skirt is the skirt and petticoats which is of paramount importance for the implementation of various steps and figures. It has three rounds, the larger of encaje.El arandelones takes several ornaments of the head or headdress, are made with artificial flowers that play with color design on the applied or painted on the skirt theFallas is placed on the bow or braid back of the head or on the side looks derecho.El male costume is simpler but equally important and consists of: The hat, the suazeño core, made mano.La shirt with open collar with front button panel centered, originally white, curly on the front and decorated with sequins and pants encajes.El should be prenses, use white or negro.Los costume accessories include the tail of the cock or silk or satin scarf and belt red Leather 10-15 cm wide.

boat: boat, ship that crossed the water.

Tourists: people from somewhere else.
terrible, something disastrous, horrible.
dirty: something dirty, disgusting.
noise: noise, scandal, uproar.
night: late, when it starts to get dark.
crime: crime, something illicit.
camel: animal is good to spend the deserts.
cheap: in bad taste, of poor quality.
friendly: nice.
hotels: building where people stay when they are traveling.
expensive: costly, hard to get for money.
safe: unharmed., without risk.
exciting: fascinating.
